HillHeightMap - Class in sage.terrain
HillHeightMap generates a height map based on the Hill Raising Algorithm.
HillHeightMap(int, int, float, float, byte, long) - Constructor for class sage.terrain.HillHeightMap
Constructor sets the attributes of the hill system and generates the height map using the specified random number generator seed.
HillHeightMap(int, int, float, float, byte) - Constructor for class sage.terrain.HillHeightMap

HUDImage - Class in sage.scene

HUDObject - Class in sage.scene
HUDObject defines a SceneNode which resides on the "HUD" (Heads-Up Display) -- that is, on the screen "in front of" normal Scenegraph (game-world) objects.
HUDObject(double, double, Color) - Constructor for class sage.scene.HUDObject
Constructs a HUDObject with the specified location (where location (0,0) is at the lower left and (1,1) is at the upper right) and the specified color.
HUDObject(double, double) - Constructor for class sage.scene.HUDObject
Constructs a HUDObject with the specified screen location and a default color of Color.red.
HUDObject() - Constructor for class sage.scene.HUDObject
Constructs a HUDObject with a default location at the lower left screen corner and a default color as specified by HUDObject.HUDObject(double, double).
HUDString - Class in sage.scene
HUDString defines a HUDObject which consists of a String.
HUDString(String) - Constructor for class sage.scene.HUDString
